tasks.title: Add comprehensive testing framework
tasks.description: Implement automated testing framework with unit, integration, and end-to-end testing capabilities to improve code quality and reduce bugs
tasks.business_value: Reduces development time, prevents regressions, and increases confidence in deployments

tasks.title: Add blockchain integration
tasks.description: Integrate blockchain technology for data verification
tasks.business_value: Provides enhanced security and decentralization

tasks.title: Test migration feature
tasks.description: Test feature to verify migration system works correctly
tasks.business_value: Validates that the new FEATURES.json system is fully operational

tasks.title: Test approval fix
tasks.description: Test feature to verify approval mechanism works
tasks.business_value: Validates approval system fix

tasks.business_value: Testing bulk functionality

tasks.title: Fix failing E2E tests for FEATURES.json migration
tasks.description: Examine and fix failing E2E tests in test/ directory (success-criteria-e2e.test.js, etc.) - Update test configuration for FEATURES.json structure - Fix timeout issues and API connection problems - Ensure tests work with new FeatureManagerAPI instead of old TaskManager - Update test data and mock structures for new schema - Verify all E2E tests pass with new system
tasks.business_value: Ensures test suite reliability and prevents regression bugs in the new FEATURES.json system

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive test coverage reporting
tasks.description: Configure Jest coverage reporting with detailed metrics, coverage thresholds for quality gates, multiple report formats (HTML, JSON, text), coverage collection for all source files, coverage scripts in package.json, and coverage reporting documentation
tasks.business_value: Provides essential code quality metrics, enables automated quality gates, helps identify untested code areas, and supports continuous integration workflows for maintaining high code quality standards

tasks.title: Create comprehensive testing documentation and best practices guide
tasks.description: Document testing architecture, best practices, test suite execution, troubleshooting, FEATURES.json testing approach, and provide examples for effective test writing
tasks.business_value: Enables developers to effectively use and contribute to test suite, improving code quality and development velocity

tasks.title: Integrate CI/CD Pipeline with Automated Testing Framework
tasks.description: Create comprehensive CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions workflow, test matrix for multiple Node.js versions, automated test reporting, pre-commit hooks, coverage reporting, and quality gates to prevent merging failing tests.
tasks.business_value: Ensures code quality through automated testing, reduces manual testing overhead, prevents bugs from reaching production, and maintains consistent quality standards across all code changes.

tasks.title: Test Feature 12345
tasks.description: This is a comprehensive test feature designed for E2E validation purposes. It includes detailed information to meet validation requirements and ensure proper testing of all system components and workflows.
tasks.business_value: Validates E2E testing functionality by providing comprehensive test coverage and ensuring all system components work correctly together in realistic scenarios

test_task_template.description_pattern: Create unit tests, integration tests, and E2E tests to achieve >{coverage}% coverage for {feature_title}. Must validate all functionality, edge cases, and error conditions.

audit_task_template.description_pattern: Run semgrep security scan, dependency vulnerability check, code quality analysis, and compliance validation for {feature_title}. Zero tolerance for security vulnerabilities.
